Package org.fcrepo.server.storage.translation

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    DODeserializer
    Reads a Fedora object in some format.
    DOSerializer
    Writes a Fedora object to some format.
    DOTranslator
    Interface for serializing and deserializing Fedora objects to/from various formats.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AllUnitTests  
    Atom1_1DODeserializer
    Deserializes objects in Atom 1.1 format.
    Atom1_1DOSerializer
    Serializes objects in Atom 1.1 format.
    AtomDODeserializer
    Deserializer for Fedora Objects in Atom format.
    AtomDOSerializer
    Serializes a Fedora Object in Atom with Threading Extensions.
    AtomZip1_1DODeserializer
    Deserializes objects in Atom Zip 1.1 format.
    AtomZip1_1DOSerializer
    Serializes objects in Atom Zip 1.1 format.
    ConvertObjectSerialization
    Utility class to convert objects from one serialization format to another.
    DOTranslationUtility
    Utility methods for usage by digital object serializers and deserializers.
    DOTranslationUtilityTest  
    DOTranslatorImpl
    A threadsafe DOTranslator that uses a map of serializers and a map of deserializers to do its job.
    DOTranslatorModule
    DOTranslatorImpl wrapped as a Module.
    FOXML1_0DODeserializer
    Deserializes objects in FOXML 1.0 format.
    FOXML1_0DOSerializer
    Serializes objects in FOXML 1.0 format.
    FOXML1_1DODeserializer
    Deserializes objects in FOXML 1.1 format.
    FOXML1_1DOSerializer
    Serializes objects in FOXML 1.1 format.
    FOXMLDODeserializer
    Deserializes objects in the constructor-provided version of FOXML.
    FOXMLDOSerializer
    Serializes objects in the constructor-provided version of FOXML.
    METSFedoraExt1_0DODeserializer
    Deserializes objects in METS_EXT 1.0 format.
    METSFedoraExt1_0DOSerializer
    Serializes objects in METS Fedora Extension 1.0 format.
    METSFedoraExt1_1DODeserializer
    Deserializes objects in METS_EXT 1.1 format.
    METSFedoraExt1_1DOSerializer
    Serializes objects in METS Fedora Extension 1.1 format.
    METSFedoraExtDODeserializer
    Deserializes objects in the constructor-provided version of the METS Fedora Extension format.
    METSFedoraExtDOSerializer
    Serializes objects in the constructor-provider version of the METS Fedora Extension format.
